data.name: Mad Trapper
data.detailed_description: We've landed on a planet..... it was a disaster!  To figure out what went wrong, you'll need to survive the harsh environment of meteor showers, and wide variety of relentless critters that inhabit this land.  Collect a tag for each critter, but beware some critters are vicious, some critters run n hide, some critters.... you never see coming!   Surviving is no easy thing, use the tools and weapons you find to help fend off the predators.  Explore the open world and see if you can figure out how to escape home. Good luck!
data.about_the_game: We've landed on a planet..... it was a disaster! Collect a tag for each critter, but beware some critters are vicious, some critters run n hide, some critters.... you never see coming!   Surviving is no easy thing, use the tools and weapons you find to help fend off the predators.  Explore the open world and see if you can figure out how to escape home. Good luck!
data.short_description: In this Simulation of an Arcade Survival you can trap, hunt and explore, of course be on the look out for crazy critters, because they will be looking for you!
